Package ru.comgrid.server.api.table

Class TableService

java.lang.Object
ru.comgrid.server.api.table.TableService
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/table", produces="application/json") public class TableService extends Object
Table service, that has most commonly used table targeted endpoints.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createTable(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User user, @RequestBody Chat chat)
      Create the table with specified parameters: 
           | param           | includes | description                |
     |-----------------|----------|----------------------------|
     | name: string    | always   | name of chat               |
     | creator: string | never    | chat's creator's unique id |
     | width: integer  | always   | width of chat in cells     |
     | height: integer | always   | height of chat in cells    |
     | avatar: string  | always   | link to avatar of chat     |
      Note: you should not include creator's id, because authenticated user's will be used
      Parameters:
      user - implementation specific user info
      chat - chat object accommodating all parameters
      Returns:
      Created Chat object in json format

    • infoAboutTable

      @GetMapping("/info") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> infoAboutTable(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User user, @RequestParam long chatId, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean includeParticipants)
      Get information about table with specified parameters: 
           | param                        | includes | description                                   |
     |------------------------------|----------|-----------------------------------------------|
     | id: integer                  | always   | unique id of table(chat)                      |
     | includeParticipants: boolean | optional | whether to include participants(Person) or not |
 
           Example:
     https://comgrid.ru:8443/table/info?chatId=1224005912&includeParticipants=true
     https://comgrid.ru:8443/table/info?chatId=111111
      Parameters:
      user - Authenticated user from Spring security
      chatId - id of chat, that you want to know info about
      includeParticipants - whether to include participants(Person) or not
      Returns:
      Chat in json format

    • getMessages

      @PostMapping("/messages") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getMessages(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User user, @RequestBody ru.comgrid.server.api.table.TableService.MessagesRequest messagesRequest)
      Get messages in square, that has top left corner to be in (xCoordLeftTop, yCoordLeftTop) point and bottom right corner to be in (xCoordBottomRight, yCoordBottomRight) point. Parameters: 
           | param               | includes | description                                                                  |
     |---------------------|----------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
     | chatId              | always   | unique chatId                                                                |
     | xCoordLeftTop       | always   | Top left point of square's x coord                                           |
     | yCoordLeftTop       | always   | Top left point of square's y coord                                           |
     | xCoordRightBottom   | always   | Bottom right point of square's x coord                                       |
     | yCoordRightBottom   | always   | Bottom right point of square's y coord                                       |
     | amountOfMessages    | optional | Amount of messages that will be loaded(maximum available 100, default is 50) |
     | sinceDateTimeMillis | optional | Minimum time of messages to include(default no limit)                        |
     | untilDateTimeMillis | optional | Maximum time of messages to include(default no limit)                        |
      Parameters:
      user - Authenticated user from Spring security
      messagesRequest - chat object accommodating all parameters
      Returns:
      Message list in json format
